LAMPA, LArge Multidomain Protein Annotator, and its application to RNA virus polyproteins.

LAMPA, LArge Multidomain Protein Annotator.

This repository contains R package LAMPA presented in LAMPA, LArge Multidomain Protein Annotator, and its application to RNA virus polyproteins by Gulyaeva AA, Sigorskih AI, Ocheredko ES, Samborskiy DV, Gorbalenya AE.
